---
title: "Text Data Analysis: R Tidytext and Python Fundamentals"
---

Welcome to the **10-hour intensive course** on Text Data Analysis. This curriculum balances **20% theory** with **80% hands-on application** [1]. We bridge statistical rigor (R) with production workflows (Python).

## Course Schedule

| Module | Focus Area | Duration | Key Sources |
|--------|------------|----------|-------------|
| **1** | Foundations & Tokenization | 2.5 Hours | [1, 4, 5] |
| **2** | Preprocessing & DTM Creation | 2.5 Hours | [6] |
| **3** | Topic Modeling (LDA/LSA) | 2.5 Hours | [7, 8] |
| **4** | Applications & Inference | 2.5 Hours | [9, 10, 11] |

## Course References
1.  *Text Analysis Curriculum: 10 Hour Design Blueprint* (2025).
2.  *Comparative Analysis of Introductory Text Data Analysis Methodologies*.
3.  *Applied Text Mining in Python*, Coursera (2025).
4.  Silge & Robinson, *Text Mining with R: A Tidy Approach* (2017).
5.  *Introduction to Text Analysis In R*, eCampusOntario.
6.  Koukaras et al., *Data Preprocessing and Feature Engineering* (MDPI, 2025).
7.  *Topic Modeling with Gensim (Python)*, Machine Learning Plus.
8.  *Topic models*, Tutorials for quanteda.
9.  *Intro to TextBlob* & *SpaCy 101 Guides*.
10. *mall: Text Summarization and Classification*, Posit (2025).
11. *Modern Text Data Analysis: A Tidy and LLM Framework*.
